title: Fiat Lux - Fac Ut Vivas - Unreleased album, 1986
description:
At the beginning of the 00's while I was running my Rare 80's MP3 site I posted quite a few tracks from one of my favourite bands of the 80's, Fiat Lux.  

I was contacted by a person who claimed to be "close to the band".  I did think "yeah, right", but was surprised after a flurry of emails to receive a CD of their unreleased album from 1986.  Most of the tracks had been released on singles, but there were a few unheard gems, "The Moment" and "Breaking the Boundaries" being the highlights.  I was given permission to post the remaining tracks which I did.

I've posted these tracks both individually and collectively over the years and other torrents deride from those past postings.  

Here is the album in 192K along with the proposed artwork.  I'm happy to encode at a higher bitrate if anyone is interested.

1.   The Moment
2.   Breaking The Boundaries
3.   Blue Emotion
4.   Embers
5.   Splurge
6.   Secrets
7.   No More Proud
8.   Photography
9.   Aqua Vitae
10.  Solitary Lovers
11.  No More Proud (Another Dub Version)
12.  Aqua Vitae (Instrumental)
